title: Available 2 Bed 2 Bath
posting_body: These apartments feature a living room, dining room, and a kitchen with standard appliances, standard countertops, a dishwasher, and disposal.
Tile flooring in the bathroom(s), plank wood flooring in the kitchen, and carpet throughout rest of the home.
Features central AC, heat, ceiling fans, and high ceilings.
Select unit include garden bathtub, kitchen island, granite countertops, wood flooring in living room, private balcony/patio.

Community amenities include online payments, clubroom, elevator, wheelchair access, fitness center, internet cafe, laundry facility, limited access, courtyards and fountains, business center, pool, sundeck, and common area WiFi.
Off-street unassigned community garage parking included in rent.
Less than a ten minute drive to Interstate 35.
PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING, ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.
***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***
